pkgmetadata.longdescription: env.py~~~~~~Mapping environment variables can be a bit of a pain.Now you can replace this boilerplate:: ZENDESK_URL = os.environ['ZENDESK_URL'] ZENDESK_USER = os.environ['ZENDESK_USER'] ZENDESK_PASS = os.environ['ZENDESK_PASS'] ZENDESK_VIEW = os.environ['ZENDESK_VIEW']With a simple call:: import env:: >>> zendesk = env.prefix('zendesk_') >>> zendesk {'user': ..., 'pass': ..., 'url': ..., 'view': ...}Or have a bit more control:: >>> env.map(user='zendesk_user') {'user': ...}
